summary: The test suite for the Kandinsky‑3 diffusion pipelines provides both lightweight unit tests using mock components and full integration tests with the actual model. It validates core functionality of text‑to‑image and image‑to‑image pipelines, covering mixed‑precision handling, batch versus single inference, deterministic outputs, and proper resource cleanup across different configurations.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, stability, and performance of the Kandinsky‑3 image generation pipelines before release, enabling rapid regression testing and confidence that the models behave as expected in production environments.
